description:
Sohoku`s Sakamichi, Imaizumi, and Teshima participate in the fall Minegayama Hill Climb. As the general classification winner of the Inter-High, all eyes are on Sakamichi, but unable to pull himself out of his slump, he is overcome with uncertainty. Meanwhile, Hakone Academy has sent their second-year Ashikiba Takuto. As Ashikiba overwhelms the other riders with his "Metronome Dancing" that makes use of his towering 202 centimeters, Sohoku`s new captain Teshima takes him on with his souful riding!
Source: crunchyroll
